channel.title: Cars
channel.description:
K, so you guys might not know, but im in to classic cars. My favorite Classics are -
1964-1973 Mustangs 1969-1970 Camaros 1970 Cuda
So, as im sitting on Moparscape today, my dad calls me outside as my parents friends pull in. Hes got a pretty sweet ride, ill admit it. Bought it for 10k and it sounds like a boss.
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/30v12t5.jpg[/img] 1987 Grand National..
Not sure if any of you have ever been in a Classic Muscle car before, It was INSANE. His dad allowed my dad to test drive it, and of course, i couldnt not go along for the ride. Its only a V6, But a 3.8 Liter. This car can go 0-60 in around 5 Seconds.
While im talking about cars, This will be my first car ( Not the exact one, but it is going to be a 1973 Mach 1 )-
http://www.cars-on-line.com/33929.html
Or, This one.
http://www.cars-on-line.com/55965.html
Ive created this thread to ask 1 question, Has anyone been in any type of Cool/Fast Car? If you have, pics would be fantastic. Ill try to post a picture of my dads car later ( 2010 Mustang V6 Convertible ).

item.title: Cars
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

[quote=“Krackkid, post:104, topic:441969”][quote author=JCor9 link=topic=544630.msg4015257#msg4015257 date=1339561856]
My first car was a v6 Ford mustang that i dropped a super charger into.

Year later

Repainted Dark Blue
Added Black Pin Strip down middle
Changed v6 - V8
Changed Super charger - twin Turbo
Added Spray (Nos)
Add and 7x10 Deck
Put 5 (15’) Type X’s
Put 6 T2500 Rockford Fosgate Amps
Made into hard top convertable
Add underglow
Add interior glow
New full racing seats
0-60 in 3.4 secs
1/4 around 9secs
1/2 around 11secs

I have puts about 25k into it but i can say no one in town is faster
[/quote]Why would you mess a mustang up like that? Also lets see some pictures.[/quote]

I wanted a show car and a car that could hit 160db in a sound comp… im at 157.4db max and i will once it uploads to my computer my phones a pos

Read full topic

item.description:
@ClawScape wrote:

Uploaded with ImageShack.us
This is a car that kinda looks like mine, its a 3.4 ramair v6 Grand Am GT1 2001
I cant take a picture of mine cause its in the shop getting a sound system, tinted windows, Body kit, and a spec-v turbo with 18 pounds of boost along with the cold air-take and k&n oiled cone filter, With it stock I could burnout in 3 gear, not bad for a v6.
